sectionText: This section will open to Food Science & Human Nutrition majors on Monday, November 14, 2016 and to business minors on Monday, November 21, 2016 at approximately 9:00 a.m.  This will open to Technical Systems Management students on Monday, November 28, 2016 at approximately 9:00 a.m.  There are currently 20 reserved seats for College of Business international exchange students; any unused seats will be released to students meeting the restrictions on Friday, January 20, 2017 at approximately 9:00 a.m. This is an elective course for undergraduate students pursuing the business minor.
